mapper.select:
select
,
from content where id < #{sinceId} order by id desc limit 10

select c.id, c.uid, c.forward_cid, c.feeling, c.type, c.conver_image, c.forward_title, c.forward_url, c.content_type, c.thumbnail, c.hot_value, c.like_count, c.authorization, c.create_time, c.status,c.content from content c right join high_quality_content h on c.id = h.cid where c.id < #{sinceId} order by c.id desc limit 10
